title: U.S. sweet potato production 2000 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in thousand cwt, containing a total of 19 data points.
Overall Production in thousand cwt has increased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Production in thousand cwt, of value 35646.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Production in thousand cwt about 12799.0 was reached at Year 2002
